decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Planning, Design + Access Statement; E01 Existing OS Plan; E02 Existing Front Elevation (West facing A-A); E03 Existing Rear Elevation (East facing B-B); E04 Existing Side Elevation (North facing C-C); E05 Existing Side Elevation (South facing D-D); E06 Existing Window Schedule; P02 Proposed Front Elevation (West facing A-A); P03 Proposed Rear Elevation (East facing B-B); P04 Proposed Side Elevation (North facing C-C); P05 Proposed Side Elevation (South facing D-D); P06 Proposed Window Schedule; MANUFACTURERS SECTION DRAWINGS AND DETAILS; MANUFACTURERS WINDOW SPECIFICATION
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun.
description: Replacement of single glazed metal windows with double glazed aluminium windows to all elevations
